author: ZeroX4
name: Formatter
description: Format numbers in various ways amd more
Change text of text object set to Formatter and various options will appear
Convert 1000 it will convert it to 1K
Make blinking colon to display time in format like 10:25 10 25 each other second

eventsFunctions.name: SetLargeNumberSuffix
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set number suffix of: Thousand to _PARAM1_, Million to _PARAM2_, Trillion to _PARAM3_, Billion to _PARAM4_, Quadrillion to _PARAM5_, Quintillion to _PARAM6_

eventsFunctions.name: SetDeviceTimeSuffix
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set time AM suffix to _PARAM1_, PM suffix to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetGameTime
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set in game time formatting for time format _PARAM1_, extra 0 in front of hour _PARAM2_, time length  _PARAM3_, separator ON _PARAM4_ OFF _PARAM5_, AM_PARAM6_  PM _PARAM7_ suffix

parameters.description: Add extra 0 in front of hour if hour is below 10
parameters.name: ExtraZero

eventsFunctions.description:
Add separators to number between each 3 digits      
From right to left if number is above 999                     
                                                                                         
For example if variable Score = 12345678 
Formatter::AddSeparator(Score, ".") = 12.345.678      
Formatter::AddSeparator(Score, "_") = 12_345_678
eventsFunctions.name: AddSeparator

parameters: SubStr(Number, 0, 1 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3)) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 1 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 3, 1))) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 4 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 6, 1))) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 7 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 9, 1))) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 10 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 12, 1))) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 13 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 15, 1))) + StrRepeat(Separator + SubStr(Number, 16 + mod(StrLength(Number) - 1, 3), 3), StrLength(SubStr(Number, 18, 1)))

eventsFunctions.description:
Create blinking separator (good for time formatting)
Formatter::Blinker(Time("sec"), ":", " ")                    
Formatter::Blinker(YourSecondsTimeVariable, ":", " ")
                                                                                             
For example                                                                   
ToString(Time("hour"))+Formatter::Blinker(Time("sec"), ":", " ")+ToString(Time("min"))
                                        
                                                                                               
Will display 12:10 and 12 10 blinking each other second
Use Formatter::Time() to display already formated time
eventsFunctions.name: Blinker

eventsFunctions.description:
Format number into 1-3 digits with extra suffix            
                                                                                       
You have variable Score equal to 1234                     
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, "", 0, "") = 1K
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, ".", 1, "") = 1.2K
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, ",", 2, " ") = 1,23 K
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, " . ", 3, "-") = 1 . 234-K
                                                                                       
Score = 987 654 321                                                  
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, ";", 0, "-") = 987-M
Formatter::FormatNumber(Score, ";", 2, "-")  = 987;65-M  
Set separator to "" to show nothing
                                                                                           
To change suffix like K M B T to k m b t or whatever  
Use action Set large number suffix                                 
Or open extension and edit it in global variables
eventsFunctions.name: FormatNumber

events.comment:
SuffixVar 0 = K       1 000
SuffixVar 1 = M       1 000 000
SuffixVar 2 = B        1 000 000 000
SuffixVar 3 = T         1 000 000 000 000
SuffixVar 4 = Qa       1 000 000 000 000 000
SuffixVar 5 = Qi         1 000 000 000 000 000 000

eventsFunctions.description:
Displays your game frames per second FPS                     
For example Formatter::FPS()                                           
                                                                                               
Or to be more fancy                                                         
"FPS "+Formatter::FPS()
eventsFunctions.name: FPS

eventsFunctions.description:
Get random word from string of words                          
Like Minecraft splash word
                                                                                             
Each word needs to be separated by ONE comma 
Formatter::RandomWord("Cat.Dog.Cow.")
Formatter::RandomWord("Sky.Boat.Tank.Ship")
eventsFunctions.name: RandomWord

eventsFunctions.description:
Display your game time in various formats                   
Add action called Set in game time formatting             
Whole configuration is there                                           
Here you only provide your hour minutes and seconds
eventsFunctions.name: GameTime

parameters: StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(trunc(Hour)))) + ToString(trunc(Hour)), min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat + 1) - 0, 1) + min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat - 0) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(ToString(trunc(Hour)), min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat + 1) - 1, 1) + min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat - 1) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(mod(trunc(Hour) - 1, 12) + 1))) + ToString(mod(trunc(Hour) - 1, 12) + 1), min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat + 1) - 2, 1) + min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat - 2) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(ToString(mod(trunc(Hour) - 1, 12) + 1), min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat + 1) - 3, 1) + min((TimeInGame.TimeFormat - 3) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(TimeInGame.SeparatorON, abs(mod(trunc(trunc(Seconds)), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(TimeInGame.SeparatorOFF, mod(trunc(trunc(Seconds)), 2)) + StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(trunc(Minutes)))) + ToString(trunc(Minutes)), clamp(TimeInGame.Length, 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(TimeInGame.SeparatorON, abs(mod(trunc(trunc(Seconds)), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(TimeInGame.SeparatorOFF, mod(trunc(trunc(Seconds)), 2)) + StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(trunc(trunc(Seconds))))) + ToString(trunc(trunc(Seconds))), clamp(TimeInGame.Length - 1, 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(TimeInGame.AM, clamp(12 - trunc(Hour), 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(TimeInGame.PM, clamp(trunc(Hour) - 11, 0, 1)), clamp(TimeInGame.TimeFormat - 1, 0, 1))

eventsFunctions.description:
Display your device time in various formats               
══════════════════════════════════╣
If time is 09 : 15 : 42 AM then                                            
Formatter::Time(0, 0, ":", " ") = 09                         
Formatter::Time(1, 1, ":", " ") = 9:15                          
Formatter::Time(0, 2, ":", " ") = 09:15:42                
Formatter::Time(2, 1, ":", " ") = 09:15AM         
Formatter::Time(3, 1, " ", " ") = 9 15AM
                                                                                             
If time is 09 : 15 : 42 PM then                                             
Formatter::Time(0, 1, ":", " ") = 21:15                    
Formatter::Time(2, 1, "-", " ") = 21-15                    
Formatter::Time(2, 2, " ", " ") = 09 15 42PM   
Formatter::Time(2, 1, ":", " ") = 09:15PM     
Formatter::Time(3, 1, ":", " ") = 9:15AM     
                                                                                             
Set separators to " " to have space between numbers
Formatter::Time(0, 1, " ", " ")
                                                                                             
Set separators to same character to stop bliinking      
Formatter::Time(0, 1, ":", ":")
                                                                                             
To change AM PM use action Set time AM PM suffix        
Or open extension and edit it in global variables
eventsFunctions.name: Time

parameters: StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("hour")))) + ToString(Time("hour")), min((TimeFormat + 1) - 0, 1) + min((TimeFormat - 0) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(ToString(Time("hour")), min((TimeFormat + 1) - 1, 1) + min((TimeFormat - 1) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(mod(Time("hour") - 1, 12) + 1))) + ToString(mod(Time("hour") - 1, 12) + 1), min((TimeFormat + 1) - 2, 1) + min((TimeFormat - 2) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(ToString(mod(Time("hour") - 1, 12) + 1), min((TimeFormat + 1) - 3, 1) + min((TimeFormat - 3) * -1, 0)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(SeparatorON, abs(mod(Time("sec"), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(SeparatorOFF, mod(Time("sec"), 2)) + StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("min")))) + ToString(Time("min")), clamp(Length, 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(SeparatorON, abs(mod(Time("sec"), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(SeparatorOFF, mod(Time("sec"), 2)) + StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("sec")))) + ToString(Time("sec")), clamp(Length - 1, 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(StrRepeat(TimeAmPmSuffix.AM, clamp(12 - Time("hour"), 0, 1)) + StrRepeat(TimeAmPmSuffix.PM, clamp(Time("hour") - 11, 0, 1)), clamp(TimeFormat - 1, 0, 1))

events.comment:
0 digit if 24H format 0
StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("hour")))) + ToString(Time("hour")),min((TimeFormat+1)-0,1)+min((TimeFormat-0)*-1,0))

NO 0 digit if 24H format 1
StrRepeat(ToString(Time("hour")),min((TimeFormat+1)-1,1)+min((TimeFormat-1)*-1,0))

0 digit if 12H format 2
StrRepeat(StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(mod(Time("hour")-1,12)+1))) + ToString(mod(Time("hour")-1,12)+1),min((TimeFormat+1)-2,1)+min((TimeFormat-2)*-1,0))


NO 0 digit if 12H format 3
StrRepeat(ToString(mod(Time("hour")-1,12)+1),min((TimeFormat+1)-3,1)+min((TimeFormat-3)*-1,0))

Minutes
StrRepeat(StrRepeat(SeparatorON, abs(mod(Time("sec"), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(SeparatorOFF, mod(Time("sec"), 2)) + StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("min")))) + ToString(Time("min")), clamp(Length, 0, 1))

Seconds
StrRepeat(StrRepeat(SeparatorON, abs(mod(Time("sec"), 2) - 1)) + StrRepeat(SeparatorOFF, mod(Time("sec"), 2)) +StrRepeat("0", 2 - StrLength(ToString(Time("sec")))) + ToString(Time("sec")), clamp(Length - 1, 0, 1))


AM PM Automatically aded
StrRepeat(StrRepeat(Time.AM,clamp(12-Time("hour"),0,1)) + StrRepeat(Time.PM,clamp(Time("hour")-11,0,1)),clamp(TimeFormat-1,0,1))

Added as parameter text
AM
StrRepeat(AM,clamp(12-Time("hour"),0,1))

PM
StrRepeat(PM,clamp(Time("hour")-11,0,1))

IF selecting by TimeFormat
NO 0 digit if 12H format 2
StrRepeat(Time.AM,min((TimeFormat+1)-2,1)+min((TimeFormat-2)*-1,0))


NO 0 digit if 12H format 3 for AM PM
StrRepeat(Time.PM,min((TimeFormat+1)-3,1)+min((TimeFormat-3)*-1,0))
